Submodule :code:`module1`
#########################

In this package we have the module :code:`arithmetic_operations` that represents the basic arithmetic operations. That module is also what we named the `documentation of the code` of the module. On the other hand, this module show the `functional documentation` of the package.

************************

Below, you will find the functional documentation of the package :code:`module1`.

   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
